Articles.Content:
Thought I really ought to join this fantastic community you've got going on here as my successes (few though they are) are down to you guys so hello and thanks.

Its been a good first two weeks with a permanent self sufficient colony on Minmus and Eve and now an interplanetary satnet is being established for operations in the Jool system, again none of which would be possible (or at least has been made safer for my Kerbals) without the help on these forums. So again thankyou to you all.

Hey Vitriol82, welcome to the forums! I hope you find them enjoyable.

Have fun and happy flying!
